Entries.LeahHouse_7_5: Ah! What an astonishing painting, Leif. I feel the emotion!$0

Entries.spouseRoom_Olivia: I'm trying some Gotoran painting techniques I read about, but they're giving me some trouble.$0#$e#Maybe I should ask Leif for some help. I hate to bother him with amateur questions, but...$6#$b#If I can master these techniques, I can paint a truly moving portrait of you, sweetie. I'd like to do that.$4

Entries.Sat2: I picked up painting as a hobby several years ago. Leif has given me some great pointers!$3#$e#He's truly a doll, wouldn't you say?$1
Entries.summer_Sat8: Leif taught me several brushstroke techniques. I envy his artistic skills.$3#$e#If I apply myself more, maybe I'll be able to paint a portrait of you one day!$1

Entries.fall_Fri: Mushrooms pop up in Cindersap Forest this time of year. Might forage for some soon.$0#$e#Andy and Leif usually take all of them, though...$3

Entries.Forest.63: It's a sculpture Leif's working on
Entries.LeahHouseSVE.1: Leif's making a meal out of fresh forage.
Entries.LeahHouseSVE.3: Paintings fill the walls of Leif's house.

Okay everyone!"/faceDirection Sebastian 3 true/faceDirection Emily 1/faceDirection Demetrius 1 true/faceDirection Elliott 0/faceDirection Pierre 0 true/faceDirection Caroline 0 true/faceDirection Shane 3/faceDirection Sam 3 true/faceDirection Abigail 3/speak Leah "Thanks for coming to my art show.$l"/faceDirection Leah 1/speak Leah "As some of you know, I came to this town because I wanted to draw inspiration from the beautiful surroundings."/faceDirection Leah 3/speak Leah "This place really feels like home now.$h#$b#Okay. I'm going to introduce my sculptures now."/playMusic jaunty/move Leah -3 0 0/faceDirection farmer 3 true/faceDirection Marnie 3 true/faceDirection Emily 3 true/faceDirection Demetrius 0/move Leah 0 -1 0/speak Leah "I haven't named this one, yet. She started out as an exercise in human anatomy, but I ended up seeing her through to completion.#$b#Her expression is intentionally unclear... is she embarrassed, amused, pained? I'll leave that for you to decide."/pause 1500/move Leah 0 1 2/faceDirection Demetrius 2 true/faceDirection Haley 2 true/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection Emily 2 true/faceDirection Clint 2 true/pause 500/speak Leah "This one's called 'Post-Dimensional Nullspace'. It represents the boundary of human imagination.$u#$b#The shape and color came to me vividly when I was in a 'trance state'."/pause 1500/move Leah 3 0 2/faceDirection Demetrius 1 true/move Leah 0 1 1/faceDirection Haley 1/speak Leah "I've been calling this one 'Egg Heads'. I wanted to create an animatronic humanoid statue to toy with the viewer's ability to properly attribute personhood to a physical entity. "/pause 1500/move Leah 0 -1 0/pause 300/faceDirection Leah 2/speak Leah "And the last one is called 'Wood Sculpture 3'. It's a celebration of my favorite sculpting material... wood."/faceDirection Leah 3/faceDirection Leah 1/faceDirection Leah 2/speak Leah "Well, those are my sculptures!$l#$b#Oh! One last thing."/faceDirection Leah 0/speak Leah "I'd like to say thanks to my special friend, @.#$b#He gave me the idea for this show and the courage to go through with it. I know that sounds cheesy, but it's true.^She gave me the idea for this show and the courage to go through with it. I know that sounds cheesy, but it's true."/faceDirection Emily 1/faceDirection Shane 3 true/faceDirection Haley 1/faceDirection Elliott 3/pause 400/speak Lewis "I'm proud of you, Leif! Events like this really breathe life into our little town!$h"/pause 100/textAboveHead Gus "Great stuff!"/faceDirection Leah 3/speak Demetrius "I love your art, Leif! 'Post-Dimensional Nullspace' is my favorite.$h"/textAboveHead Robin "Great use of wood!"/speak Penny "Thanks for doing this!$h"/faceDirection Leah 1/emote Leah 32/faceDirection Leah 2/pause 600/speak Olivia "Exquisite art, Leah!$3"/pause 200/speak Leah "Thanks, everyone!$h"/faceDirection Leah 0/emote Leah 20/pause 500/speak Lewis "Now let's start the bidding on these wonderful art pieces... A marvelous addition to your home!$h#$b#Do I hear 5000g for the pink one?"/jump Demetrius/mail afterArtShow/viewport move 2 0 8000/pause 5000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Leah "Wow! I'm exhausted.#$b#My show was a real success, wasn't it?$h"

I dropped by to check on my green beans, and they're ready to harvest.$0#$b#Gus and Pierre were here a little while ago taking care of their crops too.$0"/pause 500/move Leah 1 0 2/pause 800/playSound harvest/shake Leah 400/pause 1000/faceDirection Leah 2 true/pause 250/faceDirection Leah 0 true/pause 500/speak Leah "Pelican Town's community garden is pretty nifty, wouldn't you agree, @?$0"/pause 500/question fork0 "#The community garden is a neat idea.#It's cute, but my farm can hold 40x more."/fork 1000010_GardenAmazing/pause 500/speak Leah "...Well, not everyone is lucky enough to get free property, @.$2"/friendship Leah -250/pause 1000/move Leah 1 0 2/pause 700/playSound harvest/shake Leah 400/move Leah 1 0 2/pause 800/playSound harvest/shake Leah 400/pause 500/move farmer 0 1 1/pause 300/faceDirection Leah 3/pause 350/speak Leah "I'm very thankful for this community garden.$0#$b#I don't have much space to grow my own food...$7#$b#But thanks to this little plot of land we all share, I can.$0"/pause 500/faceDirection Leah 2 true/pause 250/faceDirection Leah 1 true/pause 300/move Leah 1 0 2/pause 300/playSound harvest/shake Leah 400/pause 650/faceDirection Leah 3 true/pause 300/move Leah -3 0 0/move Leah 0 -1 3/pause 500/speak Leah "Whew! That's all of them.$0#$b#Now I just need to decide what to cook with these tonight.$0"/pause 500/speak Leah "Here, try a fresh green bean, straight from the vine![188]$1"/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 2 true/pause 250/farmerEat 188/pause 2750/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 300/emote farmer 32 true/pause 300/emote Leah 32 true/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue Leah "I wonder when Gus' coffee beans will be ready.$0#$e#He uses special fertilizer from Pierre's.$1"

Entries.CommunityDay_Susan: Once these little sprouts I started in here are strong enough, I'll plant them in the community garden.$0
Are you growing melons this season? I just promised Leif a few from my next batch - I think he'll really enjoy them!$0
During the fall, I get so antsy when I step away from the farm.$4#$b#So many crops in the ground, and so close to the time for frost! I'm worried about my babies.$0

I get a little lonely in the winter, when everything's so dark and dreary. I know the world's just sleeping, but the nights seem so long...$2#$b#This event has revitalized me a little.$0#$b#Thank you for helping to make it happen.$1
